name: BlueJ
description:
A Small game jam game for mini jam 99: Birds!

Art by blanc_mange/blancmange#0476

How to play

Once you start up the game, you'll be taken to level 0; this level is simple. Just walk right! Collecting worms will help you refill your stamina BUT, once you have 0 stamina you

Can't stop moving (how this fits into the limitation)

You have a stamina bar which every time you switch direction or start moving goes down, when it's at 0; you can still move, but stopping will give you an instant game over.

Is this game good?

no
